graduated-as: You have graduated succesfully as a:

almost-there: Almost there! You are on the last sprint before graduation, please make sure to complete the following activities:

modal.title: It's final project time!!!
modal.subtitle: Congratulations on reaching this phase of the program.
modal.description: We are still learning a lot but this last project will become something to showcase to friends and potential employers.
bullets: Why build a final project?
How to pick your final project topic?

modal-form.title: Final project
modal-form.repository-hint: Please provide the repository URL for this project.
modal-form.screenshot-hint: Your home page or animated gif using the project.
modal-form.participants-hint: Each student taking place in this project.
modal-form.no-students: No other students have been found on this cohort, you cannot add any members to this project

confirmation.title: Are you sure?
confirmation.text: If you remove yourself from this project, you won't have access to it, and your teammates will have to add you again to regain access.

warning-modal.title: Please add someone else to the project if you want to remove yourself.
